Title: Answers
Description: Answers is a web application that allows users to create sites where community member can ask/answer questions as well as vote for said questions. It is meant to be used for Q&A sites, Knowledge Base's, Social News/Communication sites, Forum-style discussion sites, etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Answers is a web application that allows users to create sites where community member can ask/answer questions as well as vote for said questions. It is meant to be used for Q&A sites, Knowledge Base's, Social News/Communication sites, Forum-style discussion sites, etc.

The idea for this application is heavily inspired by those of Reddit, Digg, Stack Overflow and other such sites.
